# Configure revenue organization mapping

Learn how to configure revenue organization mapping using the mapping table.

You can configure the revenue organization mapping in the mapping table.

1.  In the mapping table, navigate to the row corresponding to the Zuora entity or organization for which you want to configure the mapping and click the ![Edit icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/b7bfacc7-b08c-4e34-8b32-e823742a7f92?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..7TkoJTLk5-DMSarVP864o4BQzlmwgy2mUNKO-Y78uNI) icon in the Actions column to enter the edit mode. ![Configure mapping](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/9e122313-7261-42c8-a424-c8a7c429c7ef?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..sG3VE3KfhZfh9pOjeJc91TiB9p8-AKT8hkbcolxTxLc)
2.  In the row to edit, perform the following steps: ![Edit mapping](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/788a5b14-9ce3-4485-9ffd-f3eff19b5c59?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..jqjJjXXPhyXW6mNFx9owKOaaZMnkqr_wQi0a-Bn37B0)
    1.  In the Revenue Organization Name column, navigate to the drop-down field of your row and select the Revenue organization to which you want to map your Zuora entity or organization.
    2.  Tick the corresponding checkbox in the Enable column.
    3.  Click the ![Tick.png](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/24e1fc93-4131-4dd9-89f1-6160369450f1?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..JQwz1RT8AgIgiBmxWhI6QS0CB3h4WLX95jVjwRQK5vY)icon to save your configuration.
3.  In the window, click Save to confirm the mapping configuration.
